document.full_text: kevin anderson scored a game-high 25 points, including a clinching fadeaway with 18.9 seconds left, to lift the 12th-seeded spiders to an upset of no. 5 vanderbilt.
document.title: southwest: richmond 69, vanderbilt 66: richmond outlasts vanderbilt
lines_and_colors: kevin anderson scored a game-high 25 points, including a clinching fadeaway with 18.9 seconds left, to lift the 12th-seeded spiders to an upset of no. 5 vanderbilt.
